mapper.insert: insert into tt_funding(funding_id, title, funding_content, create_date, area, start_date, end_date, deadline, price, departure, traffic, accommodation, people_num, funding_state, confirm_option, views, member_id) values(funding_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{funding_content}, sysdate, #{area}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{deadline}, #{price}, #{departure}, #{traffic}, #{accommodation}, #{people_num}, #{funding_state}, #{confirm_option}, #{views}, #{member_id})
